content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to read the file "language_resources.txt" and your computer returned a list of language learning resources. Additionally, you gave me a command to browse the website "https://www.atlasobscura.com/" and find unique destinations and interesting stories associated with them.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text highlights unique destinations and experiences offered by Atlas Obscura, including upcoming trips to Nova Scotia, Iceland, Sweden, and Tonga, as well as courses on experimental perfumery and birding. The website also features articles on various topics such as food, history, and art, as well as a community-driven database of hidden wonders around the world. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/)', '\\n\\nTrips\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/trips)', '\\n\\nExperiences\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/events)', '\\n\\nCourses\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/online-courses)', '\\n\\nPlaces\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/all-places-in-the-atlas-on-one-map)']"}]
"""
